sen.j: 廊御方 （廊の御方、ろうのおんかた 応保元年（1161年）? - 没年不詳）は平安時代末期の女性。
sen.e: Ro no onkata (1161? – date of death unknown) is a woman in the end of Heian period.
Ro no onkata (1161? – date of death unknown) was a woman who lived at the end of Heian period.
Ro no onkata (1161? – date of death unknown) was a woman who lived at the end of Heian period.
She is the eighth daughter of Kiyomori TAIRA.
She was the eighth daughter of Kiyomori TAIRA.
She was the eighth daughter of TAIRA no Kiyomori.
Her mother is Tokiwa gozen.
Her mother was Tokiwa gozen.
Her mother was Tokiwa gozen.

sen.j: 異母兄に平重盛、平宗盛、平知盛、平重衡、異母姉に平徳子が、異父兄に阿野全成、義円、源義経、異父弟に一条能成がいる。
sen.e: Her older paternal brothers include TAIRA no Shigemori, TAIRA no Munemori, TAIRA no Tomomori, and TAIRA no Shigehira; her older paternal sisters include TAIRA no Tokuko; her older maternal brothers include Zenjo ANO, Gien, MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune; her younger maternal brothers include Yoshinari ICHIJO.

Her older half-brothers (same father) included TAIRA no Shigemori, TAIRA no Munemori, TAIRA no Tomomori, and TAIRA no Shigehira; her older half-sisters (same father) included TAIRA no Tokuko; and her older half-brothers (same mother) included Zenjo ANO, Gien and MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune; her younger half-brothers (same mother) included Yoshinari ICHIJO.
sen.cmt: I'm not sure about the expressions "paternal brother" etc. I changed these to "half-brother (same father)" etc.
sen.e: Her older paternal half-brothers included TAIRA no Shigemori, TAIRA no Munemori, TAIRA no Tomomori, and TAIRA no Shigehira; her older paternal half-sisters included TAIRA no Tokuko; and her older maternal half-brothers included Zenjo ANO, Gien and MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune; her younger maternal half-brothers included Yoshinari ICHIJO.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。用語集に合わせました。

sen.e: She has another name of Sanjo-dono.
She had another name, which was Sanjo-dono.

sen.e: Biography
Biography
Biography

sen.j: 平治の乱後、母常盤が清盛の妾になり生まれる。
sen.e: After the Heiji War, her mother, Tokiwa, became Kiyomori's mistress and Tokiwa gozen was born.
Ro no onkata was born after the Heiji War when her mother, Tokiwa, became Kiyomori's mistress.
sen.cmt: Surely it is Ro no onkata who is being born here?
sen.e: Ro no onkata was born after the Heiji War when her mother, Tokiwa, became Kiyomori's mistress.

sen.j: 天下第一の美女と評され、左大臣藤原兼雅の妻（清盛の長女）と仲がよかったので上臈女房となり、後に兼雅の妾となって一女を生む。
sen.e: Since Tokiwa gozen was described as Japan's No. 1 beauty and was on good terms with the oldest daughter of Kiyomori, who was the wife of FUJIWARA no Kanemasa, the Minister of the Left, she became a high rank lady and later became Kanemasa's mistress, giving birth to one daughter.
sen.cmt: 「天下第一」→「天下一」の間違いかと思われます。
sen.e: Reputed to be the most beautiful woman in Japan, Tokiwa gozen was on good terms the wife of FUJIWARA no Kanemasa, the Minister of the Left, (who was also the oldest daughter of Kiyomori) and was therefore able to become a high ranking lady and later the mistriss of Kanemasa, by whom she had a daughter.

Reputed to be the most beautiful woman in Japan, Lady Ro was on good terms the wife of FUJIWARA no Kanemasa, the Minister of the Left (who was also the eldest daughter of Kiyomori) and was therefore able to become a high ranking lady and later the mistress of Kanemasa, by whom she had a daughter.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 和琴と書の名手であった。
sen.e: She was a master of Wagon and So (stringed instruments).
sen.cmt: 「和琴と書」→「和琴と筝」の間違いかと思われます。
sen.e: She was a master of the Wagon and So (stringed instruments).
She was a master of the Wagon (Japanese harp) and So (stringed instruments).
sen.cmt: 初出なので「Wagon」→「Wagon (Japanese harp)」としました。

sen.j: 平家一門として都落ちから壇ノ浦の戦いに至るまで行動をともにし、平徳子らとともに源氏の捕虜になる。
sen.e: She traveled with the Taira family as its member from their exile from the capital until the Battle of Dan no ura, and she became a captive of the Minamoto clan along with TAIRA no Tokuko and others.
She joined the Taira family in their exile from the capital until the Battle of Dan no ura, after which she was captured by the Minamoto clan along with TAIRA no Tokuko and others.

sen.e: Heresy
Other views
sen.cmt: "heresay" is generally used in connection with religion.
sen.e: Other views

sen.j: ただし、義経の異父妹としての廊御方は軍記物語の『平家物語』や『源平盛衰記』にのみ登場しており、『玉葉』、『吾妻鏡』など史料においては確認されていない。
sen.e: However, Ro no onkata as a younger maternal sister of Yoshitsune appears only in the "Heike Monogatari" (Tale of the Heike) and the "Genpei Seisuiki" (Rise and Fall of the Minamoto and Taira clans), and not verified in historical materials such as the "Gyokuyo" (Diary of Kanezane KUJO) and the "Azuma Kagami" (Mirror of the East).

Note, however, the information that Ro no onkata was a younger half-sister (same father) of Yoshitsune appears only in the "Heike Monogatari" (Tale of the Heike) and the "Genpei Seisuiki" (Rise and Fall of the Minamoto and Taira clans), and has not been verified in historical sources such as "Gyokuyo" (Diary of Kanezane KUJO) and "Azuma Kagami" (Mirror of the East).

Note, however, the information that Lady Ro was a younger paternal half-sister of Yoshitsune appears only in the "Heike Monogatari" (Tale of the Heike (the Taira family)) and the "Genpei Seisuiki" (Rise and Fall of the Minamoto and Taira clans), and has not been verified in historical sources such as "Gyokuyo" (Diary of Kanezane KUJO) and "Azuma Kagami" (Mirror of the East).
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。文字化けを直しました。用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 『尊卑分脈』の桓武平氏系図で清盛の娘の一人に常盤を母とする廊御方が記されているが、この書物の成立自体が南北朝時代 (日本)末期であり、室町時代以降にも多くの加筆が加えられているので、後代の人が物語に見える説を取り入れ書き加えた可能性がある。
sen.e: While Ron no onkata, whose mother is Tokiwa, is mentioned in the genealogy of the Kanmu-Heishi (Taira clan) in the "Sonpi Bunmyaku" (Lineage Sects of Noble and Humble) as one of Kiyomori's daughters, the formation of this book is in itself the end of the period of the Northern and Southern Dynasties (Japan), with a lot of information having been added after the Muromachi period, it is possible that someone of the posterity introduced and added the theory which appears in the book.

Although a Ro no onkata is mentioned in the genealogy of the Kanmu-Heishi (Taira clan) in the "Sonpi Bunmyaku" (Lineage Sects of Noble and Humble) as the daughter of Kiyomori by Tokiwa, this book was written at the end of the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan) with further information being added from the Muromachi onwards, and it is possible that this information was a late addition.

Although a Lady Ro is mentioned in the genealogy of the Kanmu-Heishi (Taira clan) in the "Sonpi Bunmyaku" (Lineage Sects of Noble and Humble) as the daughter of Kiyomori by Tokiwa, this book was written at the end of the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan) with further information being added from the Muromachi period onwards, and it is possible that this information was a late addition.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。文字化けを直しました。補足しました。

sen.j: 系図にもう一人平徳子の姉で左大臣藤原兼雅室となった清盛の娘があるが、この女子を常盤の娘に擬したところ、のちに年代が合わない事から、もう一人女子を新しく系図に加えた疑いもある。
sen.e: The genealogy mentions another daughter of Kiyomori, who is an older sister of TAIRA no Tokuko and became a lawful wife of FUJIWARA no Kanemasa, the Minister of the Left; however, if this woman is likened to Tokiwa's daughter, then discrepancy would later arise in terms of chronology, thus it is suspected that one more woman was newly added to the genealogy.

The genealogy mentions another daughter of Kiyomori, who was an older sister of TAIRA no Tokuko and became a lawful wife of FUJIWARA no Kanemasa, the Minister of the Left; but if this woman is supposed to be Tokiwa's daughter, then a discrepancy in date arises, and it is thus suspected that an extra woman was added to the genealogy at a later date.

The genealogy mentions another daughter of Kiyomori, who was an older sister of TAIRA no Tokuko and became a lawful wife of FUJIWARA no Kanemasa, the Minister of the Left; but if this woman is supposed to be Tokiwa's daughter, then a discrepancy in date arises, and it is thus suspected that an extra woman was added to the genealogy at a later date.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。文字化けを直しました。

sen.j: いずれにしても、常盤が清盛の娘を生んだ事は半ば伝説の域を出ないのである
sen.e: In either case, the story that Tokiwa gave birth to Kiyomori's daughter is only halfway out of the zone of a legend.
sen.cmt: 原文の終わりにピリオドが抜けています。
sen.e: Whether it not this is the case, the theory that Tokiwa gave birth to Kiyomori's daughter is little more than a legend.
Nevertheless, the theory that Tokiwa gave birth to Kiyomori's daughter is little more than a legend.
